text_block_list.text: I ended up not being able to speak to Admire Vega after the race.
choice_data_list: I can't just leave her alone!

text_block_list.text: I don't know what's driving her to race, nor what's causing her to worry so much, or what kind of baggage she has. But…
choice_data_list:
If I don't try to find out, 
things will never get going.

text_block_list.text: But first I needed to find her, so I began walking around the campus looking for her. That's when I saw the girl she raced with the other day, Meisho Doto.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ah, are you asking me if I've seen Ayabe-san…? Umm, err…! If I had to say whether I saw her or not, I-I'd have to say that I have, but…

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haa Ha Ha Ha! If we were ephemeral stars, we may reach that far away summit! Yet to reach that impenetrable peak, one would need to devote thy body!
choice_data_list: Are you saying she's in the mountains…?

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: If one were to put this plainly, that would be correct! And to explain it even more plainly, "she went there to conduct some trail running!"

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I, uhh…! S-Sorry, but I have something to s-say… I-If you knew where she was, you'd already be heading there, right…?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: A-Ayabe-san is very stoic and trains at a super high level… And I know this time is no different, but…

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: It is very d-dangerous…! I think the path might be too treacherous for a human…!
choice_data_list:
Thank you for worrying about 
me, but I want to do this.

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: Worry not, Doto. The chimes of fate are already ringing in her brain. Attempting to stop her would be futile.

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: Worry not, Doto. The chimes of fate are already ringing in her brain. Attempting to stop her would be futile.
While laughing loudly, she told me more about where Admire Vega had gone.
choice_data_list: You're a life-saver! See you both soon!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Awa… Sh-she's already leaving…

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: After the Selection Race, Ayabe-san said she wanted to be "alone" for a while… Is it really okay for that trainer to go…?

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: Some lean against the door. Some knock on the door. And some simply kick the door down… so this will be perfectly fine!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: You came to talk to me…?
choice_data_list: Yeah!
Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Well I have nothing to say to you. Nor do I plan on being scouted by you. Bye.
She quickly left me in the dust, but… I came here filled with resolve. I can't simply return now!
choice_data_list: Let's go…!
Let's go…!

text_block_list.text: However…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Hah… haa… haa…
choice_data_list: *Wheeze…!*

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Hah… haa… haa…
choice_data_list: *Wheeze…!*

text_block_list.text: As Meisho Doto had warned me, the path was incredibly steep and the gap between Admire Vega and I was only widening…!
Moreover…
I was starting to lose sight of her as the sun was setting, but I continued to desperately run along the steep path.
choice_data_list: I can't even see my fe- Uwaah!

text_block_list.text: (*rustle* *rustle*)
My consciousness began returning to me, little by little. As I slowly opened my eyes, I noticed the starry sky above me.
A sea of stars so vast that I could almost dive into…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Are you hurt anywhere…?
choice_data_list: Huh… Admire Vega!?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I'm asking the questions here. Are you hurt?
choice_data_list: I'm fine. Did you save me…?
I'm fine. Did you save me…?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I couldn't just leave you…
Admire Vega frowned while letting out a deep sigh. She then asked me a question.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Why are you so obsessed with me?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I had such a poor showing at the Selection Race. I know nothing about you, and aside from that race you know nothing about me.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: So why?
choice_data_list: I'm not sure. But…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: But…?
choice_data_list: I didn't want to leave you alone any longer.
I didn't want to leave you alone any longer.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I'm… fine being alone. I… prefer being alone.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Racing and winning are my burdens to bear, no one else's. After all, she… my sister…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Died in my place.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I've said too much… Forget it all.
If only a little, she confided in me some of the burdens that she carries. "I'll carry all of these burdens myself." I'm sure that's what she's thinking.
Even so…
choice_data_list: I can't leave you to do this alone!
I can't leave you to do this alone!

text_block_list.text: My legs are so heavy and my stamina has already reached its limits. Even so, since I could still see her…
choice_data_list: Hey, won't you let me be your trainer?
Hey, won't you let me be your trainer?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: You're chasing after me again and suddenly saying that…?
choice_data_list: If you want to go forward alone, that's fine.
If you want to go forward alone, that's fine.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Eh?
choice_data_list:
But I will selfishly continue 
to follow you, and selfishly support you.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: What's… with you…?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: It's almost curfew so I'm leaving.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ah, Ayabe-san! Welcome home♪ Hey, look at this cute, fluffy―

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Sorry, but could you just let me sleep? I'm… so tired…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Eh? Ah, okay…?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Zzz…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: She's making a cute face in her sleep. This. Must. Mean… that something good happened.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I had a dream. A dream that, for what feels like forever, didn't feel like it was suffocating me.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: A careless dream where a cute girl whose face I did not know and I… ran through a sea of stars together…
The following day there was a hesitant knock on the door to my office. As I opened the door, in came… Admire Vega!
choice_data_list: You came to talk about being scouted?
You came to talk about being scouted?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: If I don't have a trainer, I won't be able to enter the Twinkle Series. So either way, I'd need one eventually…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: And if I had to choose…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I would choose you.
choice_data_list:
Thank you. I look 
forward to working with you.

Thank you. I look 
forward to working with you.

text_block_list.text: Thus my days with Admire Vega had finally begun.
